name: DamnLabrinth
description: Walking through the catacombs, you accidentally find yourself cursed. Now the floor can only be walked once. You will plunge into the world of Ancient Greece and even talk to the goddess. In our game, you can climb walls avoiding curses, kill bloodthirsty monsters with a crossbow or sword. The crossbow can be used to climb walls. How? You will already know it in the game :)
